programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S2 - EP 12
programme.desc: The Legends continue their quest to find the Spear of Destiny before the Legion of Doom get their hands on the pieces. Their first stop is the future, after which they travel to Camelot and find Stargirl guarding a piece of the Spear.

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S2 - EP 13
programme.desc: The Legends are left seventy million years in the past when Rip causes the Waverider to crash after his capture.

programme.title: Shark - EP 1
programme.desc: A major wildlife series on the sharks of the world with over thirty species filmed, showing how they hunt, intricate social lives, courtship, growing up and the threats they face.

programme.title: Whacked Out Sports - EP 1
programme.desc: This series features sports mishaps, crashes and bloopers from all around the world.

programme.title: Nigella At My Table - EP 1
programme.desc: In her latest series, Nigella Lawson shares the food she cooks for family and friends. Whether offering up her fresh take on familiar classics, or creating new dishes inspired by different cuisines, Nigella ensures that everyday eating is always pleasurable, with a minimum of fuss.

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 17 - EP 38
programme.desc: (Encore) Ellen welcomes Saoirse Ronan ("Little Women"). Halsey performs her latest hit, "Graveyard".

programme.title: Zoom Zim Zam 2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Join Zoom, Zim and Zam, superheroes with superpowers, as they take you around the alphabet galaxy and teach you a different alphabet everyday. Today's alphabet is C. Cockroaches are starting to invade the planet and the superheroes are off to the rescue!

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger - EP 8
programme.desc: An unusual guest shows up in Leo's swimming pool - a dugong! Come along with the Junior Rangers as they seek a safe home for the dugong. But can they accomplish that while warding off a ship of dugong hunters? Leo spots a white-bellied sea eagle while flying his kite. Understanding that the sea eagle doesn't belong in their garden, the Junior Rangers take the sea eagle to a lake where it can find food - and its partner!

programme.title: Franklin And Friends - EP 50

(重)伟南生日，月满带了红鸡蛋回家为伟南庆祝，但天狮不肯开门，最后伟南答应和天狮一起去台湾，天狮才开门向月满拿红鸡蛋，却不让月满见伟南，将她赶走。过后，天狮又对伟南说了许多月满的坏话。.

(重)一场摩托车事故夺走了飞机工程师陈鸿亮的一只手中的工能，使他不能工作；但这却没有夺走他的干劲。 他现在在养老院里，并在园艺和修饰植物方面找到了慰藉。 他的愿望是为居民做更多的事，并与他们分享他的爱心和手工。”聚爱圆梦”团队能否将他的绿色激情变成更大的绿洲？.

programme.title: 我的左邻右里 Dear Neighbours - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) Ting Xuan confesses to Wei Ren. Ji Dan Zai realises that Wei Ren does not have feelings for Jia Ying, and he gets angry because he feels anguished that Jia Ying would fall for such a man. In contrast, he tries so hard to pursue Jia Ying, but Jia Ying always avoids him instead. (PG)(重)庭萱向为人告白，为人烦恼，把事情告诉鸡蛋仔，认为自己还在办离婚，目前不适合发展新感情。鸡蛋仔见为人根本没有把嘉颖放在心上，顿时情绪爆发，心疼嘉颖怎么会喜欢上他这种人，反观自己努力追求，嘉颖却总是避开他。.

programme.title: 单翼天使 My Guardian Angels - EP 11

programme.desc: Ain's younger brother, Muaz returns home from London. Aidil offers him a job at his office as his personal assistant. Zalia is unhappy that not only her position has been replaced by someone new but her chance of getting closer to Aidil is now ruined.

programme.title: Mek Minyak
programme.desc: The story of a young man who has to pay a high dowry within a month as a condition for marriage. Mail is given a month to deliver RM15,000 dowry to Pak Mus to marry his daughter Imah. Mail without hesitation agrees to accept the terms but causes his mother Mak Munah anxiety as he expects her to provide the money. Both are at a lost on how to raise the money in such a short amount of time.

programme.title: Cemburu Seorang Perempuan - EP 8
programme.desc: Zik is married to Erni, the love of his life. After a miscarriage that causes Erni to be infertile, Erni asked Zik to marry Dhiya, his best friend, so she can be the surrogate mother to their children. However, Erni becomes more jealous of her sister wife and starts to turn into a monster and plans to get rid of Diya in the most horrible way possible. Emillia has become obsessed over Dhia's baby, scaring her.She reminds Dhia to honour her words about her caring for the baby before she wed Zikri.Meanwhile, Nat and Badri faces a marital conflict when Nat found out that he is having an affair.

programme.title: #StayHomewithMe Warna - EP 8
programme.desc: Join Suharti Ali in #StayHomewithMe Warna, live!

programme.title: Get Fit with Me - Overcome COVID-19 - EP 4
programme.desc: In the fourth episod of Get Fit With Me, learn the forms of exercises suitable for the senior generations to strengthen their body. Do you know the type of juice that can strengthen your bladder? Also, the medical expert will share on what are the good habits that one can practice for us to overcome Covid-19.

programme.title: My Coffee Prince - EP 10
programme.desc: Adapted from Korea's most popular drama series, Coffee Prince tell the story of four young people who meet together at a cafe as they navigate through love, life and their dreams.Raikal is a smart young man who hates the idea of being tied down to one career. Reluctant to join the family business, he is ordered by his grandmother to manage a cafe. Though reluctant to run the cafe, he slowly begins to immerse himself in the gourmet coffee business. Without realizing it, Dani has fallen deeply for Raikal. She wanted to express her feelings but is unsure of her action as she still wants to keep her identity a secret from Raikal. But things get complicated when Amri begins to like Dani.

programme.title: Setelah Terlafaznya Akad - EP 1
programme.desc: After his divorce with Hani, Hanan is forced into an arranged marriage with Nawal by his mother. On the other hand, Nawal accepts her mother's suggestion to marry Hanan to hide her dark past. Hanan uses this opportunity to buy himself time to prove to Hani's family that he will change to become a better person for her and their daughter, Qalish. After divorcing Nawal, Hanan soon realises he is unable to live without her. Thus begins his quest to capture Nawal's heart and trust in him again.

programme.title: Atin, Atan & Mak Cun - EP 20
programme.desc: Mak Cun is going to Guangzhou, China to promote her products. While she is away, Kuntum who is back in town after 12 years in Saudi Arabia, take care of Atin and Atan. Atin helps her friends in their studies but she is disappointed when she is not selected as the Top Student. Then Atul and Fitri came back but Atan does not like Fitri because he spend his time with gadgets and speaks English. Can Mak Cun penetrates China's market and can Atin outdo Feng Yin as the top student? Ramu’s mother come to Mak Cun’s house to inform her that Ramu has run away. Bob meets Ramu who is hiding in the hut. They talk and he tells Ramu about his strict father who forbids him and his siblings from playing outside. Ramu is scared to get circumcised. Kamsiah try to mend her behavior. Kamsiah shares her problem with Pak Karim as why she is living away from society.

programme.title: E.A.T - EP 8
programme.desc: Guest: Haizad ImranIn the season finale of E.A.T, Tasha prepares some recipes suitable for Iftar in conjunction with the beginning of the month of Ramadhan. Guest starring drama thespian, Mastura Ahmad.

programme.title: Suamiku Mr Blind - EP 22

programme.title: Manja 5 - EP 3
programme.desc: Maintaining the MANJA branding, the content encompasses guest interviews, fashion, food, games-challenges and more. The format is VT and Live in studio. Each episode carries a specific theme which will thread the segments together. The five key segments are Tamu Minggu Ini (Chat with studio guests), Estetika (Beauty, Styling, Interior Design), Holistik (DIY, Life hacks), Makan Tiub (Food) and Bro-Sis Cuba (Activities). Spotlight (Local Entertainment Highlights will supplement these main segm Manja celebrates Earth Day today. Estetika looks on the lines of skincare in sustainable packages. Also in Holistik, learn on what is composting, and what you can do to save the earth. In TMI, chat with Ateeqah Mazlan on why she chooses to use organic health and cleaning products, not only for herself but for her family and son. Learn how to make Kombucha, and know its benefits in Makantiub. Also a performance from YK (Young Khalifa), with the song Me Gusta, in Spotlight.

programme.title: Empat Penjuru - EP 3
programme.desc: Salmah feels hurt that Uda has lied to her but remains apprehensive to approach her about it. After Uda give Along the cold shoulder during their family gathering, he make plans to celebrate Hari Raya in China with his family.

programme.title: Kultus - EP 11
programme.desc: Syafik moves to his condominium together with Syafie and Syakilla in order to avoid ELIXR. Meanwhile Diana finds Maira becoming more violent and erratic. Maira's obsession with Syakilla and Syafik is also getting more and more disconcerting. Worried that Maira might get Rob and herself arrested or even killed, Diana plans a daring move - to do whatever it takes to stop Maira.

programme.title: Mak Nak Peluk Boleh
programme.desc: Tells the bitter experience that haunted Daisy after she lost her only son, Ashman due to her busy career. Daisy feels Ashman is old enough to be independent and left him alone most of the time. She regretted her past and now she does not want Syafikah to suffer the same fate.

programme.title: Ian King Live

programme.title: The Powder Hound
programme.desc: Chris Davenport does all that he does to have fun skiing, and skiing powder is where he's at his happiest. Chris and crew go skiing in the burgeoning ski town of Revelstoke, B.C. before heading out for some runs in the backcountry. Dav shows you don't need exotic trips to enjoy skiing with friends.

programme.title: The Legend
programme.desc: Chris Davenport's innovative career and repeated personal reinvention has earned him much-deserved respect. Chris 'Dav' Davenport is a professional skier, an adventurer, and a mountaineer. He has mastered nearly every aspect of the sport, and his biggest adventure yet is trying to ski Mount Everest.

programme.title: Dakar, Senegal
programme.desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe explores the markets for food, fashion and art in Dakar, Senegal. Original host of the toughest motorsports rally in the world, Dakar, Senegal is a powerful and colourful city. Hubertus von Hohenlohe explores the local markets for food, fashion and art.

programme.title: The Big Show
programme.desc: Bomber and Life have made it to BlizzCon, where the pressure is on with intense StarCraft II matches. Bomber and Life make it to BlizzCon, where the pressure's on in the first round with intense matches. Bomber is on a roll, but can he actually make it through to the finals and take a world championship? Can Life vanquish a series of tough opponents?

programme.title: New Beginnings
programme.desc: Ken Roczen has to compete against Ryan Dungey and former teammates in defence of his MX championship title. After making the decision to leave his longtime sponsor KTM, Ken Roczen and his new team have to prove themselves all over again in their pursuit of the 2015 championship. Will Ken again claim victory, or has he painted a bigger target on his back?

programme.title: History in the making
programme.desc: Scotty James and Pecky arrive back in Australia and hit the road to Victoria. Scotty James and Pecky arrive back in Australia and hit the road to Mt Buller in Victoria – the mountain where it all started for SJ. It's time for the pair to pitch their big idea and make their halfpipe dream come true.

programme.title: Stronger
programme.desc: The newest film from Union Binding features 4K shredding from their stacked roster of riders. With a line-up of riders including Travis Rice, Kazu Kokubo, Gigi Rüf, and Scott Stevens, Union Binding's new film is set to blow minds with a full-length 4K snowboarding shred fest. From big mountain lines to urban rails, this flick has it all.

programme.title: The Wet Desert
programme.desc: The weather wreaks havoc for Aidan Glasby’s and Daryl Clarke’s microlight adventure in the Australian Outback. The weather wreaks havoc both in the air and on the ground as Aidan Glasby, Daryl Clarke and the microlight crew travel through the Australian Outback. Sweeping winds and a rainstorm make for precarious rides through the landscape.

programme.title: Stormy Weather at X Games
programme.desc: Bryce Menzies touches down in Spain to race rallycross at the Barcelona X Games. Bryce Menzies touches down in Spain to race rallycross at the Barcelona X Games. Before the race, the crew enjoys the Spanish culture and nightlife. When a storm rolls in and turns the course into a mud bog, Bryce wonders if he’ll get to race at all.

programme.title: Back to Back Racing
programme.desc: In the midst of a busy racing schedule, Bryce and the crew head out to Tennessee, USA to race some rallycross. In the midst of a busy racing schedule, Bryce and the crew head out to Tennessee to race some rallycross at Bristol. Once the race in Bristol is over, the crew hops on a plane to catch another race at the Chicagoland Speedway.

programme.title: Fatima's Hand
programme.desc: BASE jumper Karina Hollekim risks an extreme 600m jump from Hand of Fatima in the Malian desert. BASE jumper Karina Hollekim risks an extreme jump at Hand of Fatima in the Malian desert, but this stunning cliff formation in the Sahel region of West Africa, located far from civilization, proves a daunting challenge due to high winds and heat.

programme.title: Majid Jordan
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes with Toronto-based R 'n' B duo Majid Jordan as they go on their first live tour. Toronto-based R 'n' B duo, and Drake proteges, Majid Jordan have come a long way from making music only for themselves. Go behind the scenes of their first tour as the two friends create, perform and emerge from their mentor's shadow.

programme.title: Mind of a Beast
programme.sub-title: Daigo Umehara: Japan's first pro gamer
programme.desc: Daigo Umehara has been at the top of the Street Fighter world for years, but still loves each new challenge. Daigo Umehara has been at the top of the competitive Street Fighter world since he was a teenager. Daigo opens up about the difference between himself and his competitive persona, Umehara, and talks about why he embraces each new challenge he faces.

programme.title: Crash, Thrash and Bash
programme.desc: As the 2017 season comes to a close, take a look back at the most memorable moments of the year. As Loïc Bruni and the rest of the UCI downhill racers approach the end of the 2017 season, take a look back on the most memorable moments, heaviest crashes, thrilling victories and crushing defeats of the year.

programme.title: Iron to the Core
programme.desc: Long-distance triathlete Sebastian Kienle gives an inside look at what it takes to be an IRONMAN athlete. Decorated long-distance triathlete Sebastian Kienle gives an inside look at what it takes to be an IRONMAN athlete. From preparation to race day, it's a life spent enduring gruelling trials, but every small success makes the arduous journey worth it.

programme.title: Blast Off
programme.desc: Aiden Glasby and Daryl Clarke embark on an adventure across Australia with modest microlight equipment. Aiden Glasby and Daryl Clarke embark on an ambitious adventure across Australia with a pair of modest microlight aircrafts. Accompanied by their fiancées, Lexi and Elsie, and a local guide, Bart, they fly to their first stop: Wardang Island.

programme.title: Chasing the win
programme.desc: Follow the journeys of the world's greatest surfers as they take on Hawaii's legendary Banzai Pipeline. Volcom Pipe Pro continues with some bigger names taking their turn. Follow Ian Walsh, Jamie O'Brien and Adriano de Souza, among others, as they take on the legendary Pipeline in Oahu, Hawaii, each of them wanting that victory more than anything.

programme.title: Medellin, Colombia
programme.desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe discovers the historic and cultural treasures of Medellin, Colombia. Hubertus von Hohenlohe makes his way to one of the top locations to visit in South America – Medellin, Colombia. He digs into the history and the way this city has transformed in recent years.

programme.title: Raízs
programme.desc: Raízs is a farm-to-table platform that connects consumers to healthier food and the people who grow it. Raízs is a farm-to-table e-commerce platform that connects consumers to healthier food and the people who grow it. This builds bonds between farmers and the people who eat their crops.

programme.title: Homeboy Industries
programme.desc: An organisation in Los Angeles is transforming the lives of former gang members through community and hope. An organisation in Los Angeles is transforming the lives of former gang members through community and hope. Homeboy Industries allows people a chance to go from “shedding blood to baking bread”.
